# particleBirthRate

**Instance Property**

The rate at which new particles are created.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var particleBirthRate: CGFloat { get set }
```

```swift
var particleBirthRate: CGFloat { get set }
```

## Discussion

The number of particles generated by the emitter every second. The default value is `0.0`.

## Controlling When Particles Are Created

- **advanceSimulationTime(_:)**: Advances the emitter particle simulation.
- **resetSimulation()**: Removes all existing particles and restarts the simulation.
- **numParticlesToEmit**: The number of particles the emitter should emit before stopping.
